itemDescription: Scottish photographer and landowner in Australia

wikipedia_page.main: Robert Tennent FRSE (1815-15 December 1890) was an early Scottish photographer and major landowner in Australia.

response: * Robert Tennent FRSE (1813–1890), pioneer photographer and his younger brother Hugh Lyon Tennent (1817–1874) (N)
:* Robert Tennent (1813-1890) and his younger brother Hugh Lyon Tennent (1817-1874)
In 1877 he was elected a Fellow of the Royal Society of Edinburgh. His proposers were William Thomson, Lord Kelvin, Alexander Crum Brown, Robert Tennent and John Hutton Balfour.
